Text: hey tvteam (TVT should all be capitalized in your name) why are you still uploading with the most archaic method of file distribution? shared file progress amongst all downloaders is fucking stupid. it wastes the bandwidth of everyone who could potentially upload more while some have stupid slow download speeds. you fucking suck. i've been wanting to say this for years but as you know if you've been frequenting the site as long as I have it wasn't worth disabling javascript (to avoid malware) to try and post crap. change your upload distribution method douches. it goes ettv > eztv > all others, currently. you all are a joke.

term421 stop copying and pasting your bullshit all over TPB... No one gives a shit what you think.

Also just because you can afford cable doesn't mean I can. 

Go fuck yourself.

"term421 stop copying and pasting your bullshit all over TPB" you are as dub as they come aren't you? if there was (and maybe there is) a post history it would show I had 1 ONE post ...and guees where! here. suck a glock you piece of shit.
